import React, { Component } from 'react' import NavBar from './Components/NavBar' import News from './Components/News' import LoadingBar from 'react-top-loading-bar' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, } from 'react-router-dom' export class App extends Component { apiKey=process.env.apiKey state = { progress:0, } setProgress = (progress)=>{ this.setState({progress: progress}) } render() { return (
) } } export default App
